verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Lord, you have my heart newline And I will search for yours, newline Jesus take my life and lead me on

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lord you have my heart newline and I will search for yours newline Let me be to you a sacrifice

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And I will praise you Lord newline And I will sing of love come down newline And as you show your face newline We'll see your glory here.
